data.title: Preston Local Studies Library look up marriage for Faulkner 1906 Pendelton
data.meta_description:
hi 
if there is anyone who is going to visit Local Studies Library in Preston,if you come across an marriage for my grandfather Philip Faulkner born 1889 his father was called Thomas. i think he was married at St george's Pendelton 1906 -1926. That would fab if someone could help, as i cant get to preston. 
cheers
data.text:
hi

if there is anyone who is going to visit Local Studies Library in Preston,if you come across an marriage for my grandfather Philip Faulkner born 1889 his father was called Thomas. i think he was married at St george's Pendelton 1906 -1926. That would fab if someone could help, as i cant get to preston.

cheers

www.lancashirebmd.org.uk lists the marriage of Philip P. M. Faulkner & Sarah E. Wheat in 1912 at "Salford Register Office or Registrar attended". If this is the correct couple then, unless St George's was a Catholic Church or a non-conformist one & unlicensed for marriages, they are unlikey to have been married there. Without knowing the church where a marriage took place, the easiest way for you to find the marriage is through the above site or through the GRO site.

Thanks for replying ,unfortunately Philip P.M Faulkner isnt my grandfather. they were Catholic. I have try the web site above plus others but still cant find the marriage. 100% they were married in pandleton salford, so i dont understand why i cant find it. Found his dads brother on the 1901 cenus it says he was married in pendleton and his children weremessage=Thanks for replying ,unfortunately Philip P.M Faulkner isnt my grandfather. they were Catholic. I have try the web site above plus others but still cant find the marriage. 100% they were married in pandleton salford, so i dont understand why i cant find it. Found his dads brother on the 1901 cenus it says he was married in pendleton and his children were born also in pendleton but cant find a marriage record for them or birth records for his children. But no plob finding the marriage of his other brother who also live in pendleton.
